# Parcel Boilerplate

## Express build html/css/ts application

### Specification
- JavaScript / **TypeScript** support
- live reload



### Only three steps to start:
1. `npm install`
2. `npm run start`
3.  go to browser: http://localhost:1234


More information on Parcel WebPage
[<img src="data:image/png;base64," />
](https://parceljs.org/docs/)
